chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_lifted_leader_sublog_host net

Premises:
msg_lifted_leader_sublog_host = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
Inductive msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := MRRIR_init : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | MRRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | MRRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record match_index_all_entries_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_match_index_all_entries_interface { match_index_all_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> match_index_all_entries net } Arguments match_index_all_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_match_index_all_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Build_match_index_all_entries_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> match_index_all_entries net) -> match_index_all_entries_interface
Record raft_msg_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface { msg_refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net) } Arguments raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
msg_lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
msg_lower_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
msg_lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)
msg_lift_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_invariant : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs net
ghost_log_entries_match_invariant : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> ghost_log_entries_match_host net
Record ghost_log_entries_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_ghost_log_entries_match_interface { ghost_log_entries_match_invariant : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> ghost_log_entries_match_host net } Arguments ghost_log_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_ghost_log_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record ghost_log_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_ghost_log_correct_interface { ghost_log_correct_invariant : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> ghost_log_correct net } Arguments ghost_log_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_ghost_log_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface { log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_invariant : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs net } Arguments log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_log_property = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : list entry -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, (list entry -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments msg_log_property {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net; entries_sorted_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> eIndex e > 0 } Arguments refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
msg_simulation_1 : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net)
Record one_leaderLog_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface { one_leaderLog_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term net; one_leaderLog_per_term_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_log net; one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net } Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net) } Arguments raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Build_ghost_log_entries_match_interface : (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> ghost_log_entries_match_host net) -> ghost_log_entries_match_interface

```coq
```coq
intros net H.
induction H.

- simpl. rewrite <- IHmsg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable. auto.

- simpl. destruct H as [failed [net' [failed' [out [Hrf Hstp]]]]].
  apply msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset with net.
  + intros h.
    destruct (NWStateDec h) as [h|]; try contradiction.
    rewrite Hstp. reflexivity.
  + intros p.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_app_iff.
    left.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_app_iff.
    right.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_app_iff.
  + auto.

- simpl. destruct H as [h [inp [gd [out [d [l [Hhd [Hgd Hout]]]]]]]].
  apply msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot with net.
  + rewrite Hhd. reflexivity.
  + intros h'.
    destruct (NWStateDec h') as [h'|]; try contradiction.
    rewrite Hhd. reflexivity.
  + simpl.
    apply in_app_iff.
    left.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_app_iff.
    right.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_map_iff.
    destruct p as [p|]; try contradiction.
    apply in_app_iff.

Qed.```
